text: Ahava, in Hebrew love, may indicate: *Ahava Dead Sea Laboratories, an Israeli cosmetics company with headquarters in Lod *Ahava rabbah, a prayer and blessing that is recited by followers of Ashkenazi Judaism during Shacharit *Ahava Raba, blessing recited before the Shema *Ahava (Bible), name of a biblical canal or river mentioned in the Book of Ezra *Ahva, Israel, a village in Israel *Ahava (crater), a crater on Venus == See also == * Achawa (disambiguation) * Ahva (disambiguation)
title: Ahava (disambiguation)
